org.universAAL.ui.gui.swing.bluesteelLAF.support

Class ComponentBorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.border.AbstractBorder
      • org.universAAL.ui.gui.swing.bluesteelLAF.support.ComponentBorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Border

    public class ComponentBorder
extends AbstractBorder
    A Border that paints as title a Component. TODO: only checked default positions.
    Author:
    amedrano
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
